@SenatorRisch Please urge the Senator to vote no on opening the Boundary Waters reserve to copper mining. A foreign company would get 20 years of profits for an indefinite span of time for acid pollution runoff into Lake Superior. It's not a good deal for Americans or our beautiful lakes.

@SenatorRisch Last month I received a bill from Idaho Power for over $228. That included some heating from a wood stove! Previous months were around $100. Idaho Power is a monopoly so they get away with outrageous heating bills!!! What can be done about it???

@SenatorRisch Negotiating with the mullahs is giving them time. They kill their own people while making empty promises. History is watching. Don’t trust a regime that brutalizes its citizens & threatens the world. #FreeIran #NoNegotiationWithMullahs #IranRevolution2026 https://t.co/9tf0fRnRCt
